00021 #ifndef PRIMITIVES_H_
00022 #define PRIMITIVES_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include <cstdint>
00026 #define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS
00027 #include <cinttypes>
00028 
00029 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00030 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00031 
00032 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00033 
00034 typedef unsigned char byte;
00035 typedef int16_t sshort;
00036 typedef int32_t sint;
00037 typedef int64_t slong;
00038 typedef uint16_t sushort;
00039 typedef uint32_t suint;
00040 typedef uint64_t sulong;
00041 
00042 #define S_FMT_S PRIi16
00043 #define S_FMT_US PRIu16
00044 #define S_FMT_I PRIi32
00045 #define S_FMT_UI PRIu32
00046 #define S_FMT_L PRIi64
00047 #define S_FMT_UL PRIu64
00048 
00049 #define SIC(x) INT32_C(x)
00050 #define SUIC(x) UINT32_C(x)
00051 #define SLC(x) INT64_C(x)
00052 #define SULC(x) UINT64_C(x)
00053 
00054 
00055 #ifdef __i386__
00056 typedef suint idx_t;
00057 typedef sint sidx_t;
00058 
00059 typedef suint ptr_t;
00060 #elif defined(__x86_64__)
00061 typedef sulong idx_t;
00062 typedef slong sidx_t;
00063 
00064 typedef sulong ptr_t;
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 typedef sulong fsize_t;
00068 typedef slong fssize_t;
00069 
00070 namespace std {
00071     using ::sidx_t;
00072     using ::idx_t;
00073     using ::fsize_t;
00074     using ::fssize_t;
00075     using ::ptr_t;
00076 }
00077 
00078 #ifndef SYLPH_LIKELY
00079     #if __GNUC__ - 0 >= 3
00080         #define SYLPH_LIKELY(x) __builtin_expect(!!(x),1)
00081         #define SYLPH_UNLIKELY(x) __builtin_expect(!!(x),0)
00082     #else
00083         #define SYLPH_LIKELY(x) (x)
00084         #define SYLPH_UNLIKELY(x) (x)
00085     #endif
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 
00089 #define SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,Type) extern template class Class<Type>
00090 
00091 #define SYLPH_SPECIALIZE_PRIMS(Class) \
00092     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,byte); \
00093     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,sint); \
00094     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,suint); \
00095     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,slong); \
00096     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,sulong); \
00097     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,bool); \
00098     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,float); \
00099     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,double); \
00100     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,::Sylph::String)
00101 
00102 // Conversions ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00103 
00104 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00105 namespace Convert {
00106     inline suint float2int(float f) {
00107         return *reinterpret_cast<suint*>(&f);
00108     }
00109     inline float int2float(suint i) {
00110         return *reinterpret_cast<float*>(&i);
00111     }
00112     inline sulong double2long(double d) {
00113         return *reinterpret_cast<sulong*>(&d);
00114     }
00115     inline double long2double(sulong l) {
00116         return *reinterpret_cast<double*>(&l);
00117     }
00118     template<class T>
00119     inline byte* a2bseq(const T& t) {
00120         return reinterpret_cast<byte*>(&t);
00121     }
00122 
00123     template<class T>
00124     inline byte* a2bseq(const T* const t) {
00125         return reinterpret_cast<byte*>(t);
00126     }
00127     template<class T>
00128     inline T& bseq2a(const byte* b) {
00129         return *reinterpret_cast<T*>(b);
00130     }
00131 
00132     template<class T>
00133     inline ptr_t ptr2int(const T* const t) {
00134         return reinterpret_cast<ptr_t>(t);
00135     }
00136 }
00137 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00138 
00139 #endif  /* PRIMITIVES_H_ */
